ISSUE.TITLE: Access device over Wi-Fi
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Can we add devices that are connected to ADB over tcpip, not connected with USB? When I try this way, cannot see device on sft application.

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Bump cookie-session from 2.0.0-beta.2 to 2.0.0-rc.1 (#91) Bumps [cookie-session](https://github.com/expressjs/cookie-session) from 2.0.0-beta.2 to 2.0.0-rc.1. - [Release notes](https://github.com/expressjs/cookie-session/releases) - [Changelog](https://github.com/expressjs/cookie-session/blob/master/HISTORY.md) - [Commits](https://github.com/expressjs/cookie-session/compare/2.0.0-beta.2...2.0.0-rc.1) Signed-off-by: dependabot-preview[bot] <support@dependabot.com> Co-authored-by: dependabot-preview[bot] <27856297+dependabot-preview[bot]@users.noreply.github.com>

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Fix issue on File Explorer (#97) * Fix issue on File Explorer While getting a file on a controlled device, the connection to minicap service was stopping due to the URL redirection. Signed-off-by: Denis barbaron <denis.barbaron@orange.com>
